quest.name: ArmorForDagobert
quest.title: Armor For Dagobert
quest.description: Dagobert, the consultant at the bank of Semos, asked me to find a leather_cuirass for him.

history.entry: I have met Dagobert. He is the consultant at the bank in Semos.
I promissed to find a leather_cuirass for him because he has been robbed.
He asked me to find a leather_cuirass but I rejected his request.
I found a leather_cuirass and will take it to Dagobert.
I took the leather_cuirass to Dagobert. He thanked me and gave a small reward.

hints.entry: I see that you will take a leather_cuirass from a dead cyclops.
I see that you will fight some cyclopes living in the dungeon deep under Semos.

quest.name: IntroducePlayers
quest.title: Helping Tad
quest.description: First quest: Tad, a boy in Semos Townhall, needs help.

history.entry: I have met Tad in Semos Townhall
He asked me to buy a flask from Margaret in Semos Tavern.
I got a flask an will bring it to Tad soon.
Tad asked me to take the flask to ilisa at Semos Temple.
Ilisa asked me to get a herb called Arandula which I can find north of Semos, near the tree grove.
I found some Arandula herbs and will bring them to ilisa.
Ilisa created a powerful potion to help Tad. She asked me to tell him that it is ready.
Tad thanked me.

quest.name: Campfire
quest.title: Campfire
quest.description: Sally wants to build a campfire, but she doesn't have any wood.

history.entry: I have met Sally
I do not want to help Sally
I do want to help Sally
I have found the 10 wood needed to start the fire
I have given Sally the wood. She gave me some food in return. I also gained 50 xp

quest.name: BeerForHayunn
quest.title: Beer for Hayunn
quest.description: Hayunn, the great warrior outside the rat dungeon, wants a beer

history.entry: I have talked to Hayunn
I do not want to make Hayunn drunk
I will give Hayunn one drink
I have a beer
I gave the beer to Hayunn. He paid me 20 gold coins and 10 xp
